00074 extern "C++"

00076 
00077 __inline int                                    mini(int x, int y)                              { return x<y?x:y; }
00078 __inline float                                  mini(float x, float y)                  { return x<y?x:y; }
00079 __inline double                                 mini(double x, double y)                { return x<y?x:y; }
